product_name: Club Ride Half Rack Bike Knickers - Men's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: These rugged Club Ride Half Rack Bike Knickers for men offer more protection than shorts and more ventilation than full pants-the best of both worlds! RideDryWear(TM) nylon/spandex fabric offers excellent moisture wicking, abrasion resistance and comfortable stretch. Adjustable waistband; articulated knees. Club Ride Half Rack bike knickers feature lots of pockets, including several with zippers. Closeout.
short_description: These rugged Club Ride Half Rack Bike Knickers for men offer more protection than shorts and more ventilation than full pants-the best of both worlds!
